SEARCH

Class CampList

java.lang.Object
CampList
public class CampList extends Object
The CampList class represents a list of camps, providing methods for creating, editing, and managing camp details. It maintains a master list of Camp objects and allows operations such as creating, updating, and deleting camps.

Camp details can be modified only if the camp has no registered students or camp committee members. Attempts to modify details of a camp with registered participants will result in a warning message.

The class also provides methods for retrieving the master list of camp objects.

  • Method Details

    • createCamp

      public void createCamp(String campName, Date startDate, Date endDate, Date registrationClosingDate, String userGroup, String location, int totalSlots, int campCommitteeSlots, String description, Staff staffInCharge, ArrayList<Student> listOfCampCommittee, ArrayList<Student> listOfAttendees, boolean visibilityToggle)
      Creates a new camp and adds it to the master list.
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp.
      startDate - The starting date of the camp.
      endDate - The ending date of the camp.
      registrationClosingDate - The closing date for camp registration.
      userGroup - The targeted user group (e.g., faculty or whole school).
      location - The location where the camp will take place.
      totalSlots - The total number of attendee slots available.
      campCommitteeSlots - The maximum number of committee slots (up to 10).
      description - A brief description of the camp.
      staffInCharge - The staff member in charge of the camp.
      listOfCampCommittee - The list of students forming the camp committee.
      listOfAttendees - The list of students registered as attendees.
      visibilityToggle - The visibility status of the camp.
